definition: to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
surname Zhan
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正進一步開展細胞遺傳和育種利用研究。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形或線形，直立或開展，基於側配對。

sentences.english: To perform shift and work overtime when necessary.
sentences.chinese: 開展本班次工作和必要時延時工作。

sentences.english: Launch an effort to get together the various departments.
sentences.chinese: 開展將各個部門聚集在一起的工作。

sentences.english: The report said the pipeline agency was hampered by a chronic inspector shortage.
sentences.chinese: 報告說，長期缺乏檢查員妨礙了管道安全局開展工作。

sentences.english: What persuaded you to start Global Voices in Bangla?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼使你決心開展孟加拉版的全球之聲？

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on HIV/AIDS-related knowledge, attitude, and performance (KAP) in Jianghua Yao Autonomous County.
sentences.chinese: 目的對江華縣開展艾滋病防治健康教育進行效果評價。

sentences.english: The government will phase out an advertising campaign.
sentences.chinese: 政府將分階段開展廣告宣傳。

sentences.english: If we recover the waste materials through grading recovery, we can create these renewable resources.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們開展分級回收，就能夠創造這些再生資源。

sentences.english: Hold feeding programs with non-profit organizations.
sentences.chinese: 和非營利組織一起開展供養項目。

sentences.english: Now a mass movement to plant trees is in full swing all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆性的技術革新運動正在該廠蓬勃開展。

sentences.english: So making the study of slag mucks as silicon fertilizer was significant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，開展工礦廢渣作硅肥的研究具有重要意義。

sentences.english: He gathered up his strength for the new job.
sentences.chinese: 他鼓足勁頭來開展新的工作。

sentences.english: The Hainan example represents the first province-wide spatial planning.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是全國第一個開展省域空間規劃的改革試點。

sentences.english: I heard that a mass campaign encouraging show love to the victims of earthquake-stricken area is now widespread.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說爲地震災區的災民獻愛心的活動在廣泛開展。

active/energetic/vigorous/positive (outlook)/proactive

to implement/to carry out
to reinforce/to strengthen/to increase
to combine/to join/unite/alliance
to advance together
project
related/relevant/pertinent/to be interrelated/(statistics) correlation
